Add a profile photo, describe your service, enter your information, add your service location and ask for a review to create an awesome profile.

To offer good quality services to customers, each professional on the platform has to fulfill minimum requirements of experience and skill. Please provide as much information as possible in your profile so we can take a decision.
M-Safiri is a platform. Once approved, you have to save route to start your ride.
You are few steps away from \ncompleting your profile.
